messages.message:
Hey all, I wanted to poll the eng team and see if anyone had any concerns with merging `apps-server` into `webapp`? We started the webserver consolidation effort a couple years ago (that merged `api-server` and `api-server-apps`) and it didn't finish. In an effort to further reduce the complexity of our stack, I think this would be a huge win, I want to make sure I'm not missing anything.

Pros
• Reduce the complexity of our deployments by getting rid of another service
• Simplify local development by having one fewer service to bring up
• Merge resource usage with webapp since usage and code patterns are very similar already.
• Less vulnerabilities to fix!
• Might be able to cleanup proxying logic in webapp
Cons
• Backports from master to older branches touching apps-server will no longer work
• Searching git history will be a bit more difficult
